msg: Backed out my exec changes, but leave them commented in in case....

author: dims
msg: - Separate out ParamItem and ParamSet to reduce clutter.
- Use only one instance of Ant instead of creating a new CallTarget everytime...

author: seibert
msg: The latest in leak protection technology.
There are now a few build failures that I need to work out, but the memory footprint

author: seibert
msg: The <ant /> calls are now <exec /> calls.  The exec calls protect from the
"leaf level" files leaking, the foreach task leaking, and the ant task leaking

author: seibert
msg: Leaving in the javac.fork flag, but setting it to "no" since it doesn't seem
to be the solution for this problem, and imposes a performance hit
